attributes.action: NO to monitoring of Calls, Emails, Texts and Website visits
attributes.additional_details:
Under proposed legislation, the government will be able to monitor the calls, emails, texts and website visits of EVERYONE in the UK. Not just if you're a suspect, not just if you're speaking to someone under investigation, but EVERYONE. Without a warrant. Without a reason.

Why do they need to do this? They say that it is "vital" to protect the public, and that if you have nothing to hide, you have nothing to fear. I say that whilst a police state is a secure state, CIVIL LIBERTIES COME FIRST.
